entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
